drupalNodeEvent.title: Understanding China Series: Stories of China’s First Premier, Zhou Enlai — reflecting back, and looking forward to China in the 21st Century.

field_speakers.processed: Xiaofang Zhou (Zhou Enlai Peace Institute),Michael North (Zhou Enlai Peace Institute),Elisabet Sahtouris,Ma Mengjia

field_organizers.processed: University of Hawai'i at Mānoa Center for Chinese Studies, Zhou Enlai Peace Institute

field_description.processed: This webinar will discuss Zhou Enlai, the first Premier of modern China, and how to connect his extraordinary life story with our challenging times. What lessons can be learned from this student and leader of the Chinese Revolution that will help us to understand the China of 2021?
